discussion.p: When LWG removed allocator support from packaged_task, it forgot to remove the uses_allocator partial specialization.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4659.

li.p: Modify , header <future> synopsis, and , class template packaged_task synopsis, as indicated:

pre.del: template <class R, class Alloc> struct uses_allocator<packaged_task<R>, Alloc>;

p.del: -2- Requires: Alloc shall be an Allocator (20.5.3.5).
